content.rendered:
Analyst

Experience Requirements

  • 5 years of experience required in Training in DoD/Federal environment

Experience in developing and maintain an Assessor Introduction Training (AIT) course to cover the tools and competencies necessary to be an assessor

Education Requirement:

  • Bachelor’s degree (IT-related field preferred)
